title: Chiropractor Alexandria VA | Triandos Chiropractic and Acupuncture
author: - Bob L
description: Dr. Nick Triandos, Chiropractor Alexandria, provides effective chiropractic care for patients of all ages. Call today for an appointment. Insurance accepted.
cleaned_text: Get Better Faster We determine the root cause of the problem and address it so you can get better faster. With [numerous chiropractic techniques](/chiropractic-care/) and acupuncture at our disposal, we have many tools in our toolbox to get you feeling fantastic.a Providing Care for All Ages At our clinic, everyone is welcome. We see patients of all ages, from babies to seniors to pregnant women. From the moment you walk through our door, you'll be [made to feel comfortable and at home](/new-patients/). Diana, who works at our front desk, loves getting to know patients. While we're always professional, we also like to laugh. [Our practice has a happy vibe](/about-us/) that's different from the clinical feel you've likely experienced elsewhere.
